1525990.name: Cubiti pARti
1525990.description:
The p-AR-ti Is On!

Cubiti pARti Supports Tilt Five!
Level up your game night with tabletop holograms! The Tilt Five™ holographic gaming system
transforms tabletop and video games into 3D vibrant holographic environments. Using the
Tilt Five™ augmented reality (AR) glasses, Gameboard, and Wand controller, you can immerse
yourself--and friends--in experiences like never before.

When putting on the Tilt Five™ Glasses, the Cubiti mini games reach new heights! Will you master holographic Hoopshot or conquer the competition in Cubiti Smash? It's time to gather your friends and experience a pARti that will rise up in front of you, all in holographic 3D!

Visit Tilt Five's website to find out how to bring Cubiti pARti alive on your tabletop!



Up to 4 players can compete online in this insanely fun real-time party game!

pARti with your friends online in real-time multiplayer tournaments or get competitive against random players on PC and mobile!

Compete against players on iOS and Android as well as PC with cross-platform play.

- Hit the basketball court and shoot the hoops in Hoopshot!
- Test your ultimate skills with the epic Dash Hurdles!
- Think fast in Smashi in this uniquely fun twist on Wack-a-mole!
- Smash goals against your friends in Ricochet Ace!
- Challenge your reactions as you master the Dodge Arena!
- Race to the top of the tower in Danger Climb!

With over 50 fun Cubiti characters to select, you can discover YOUR favourite Cubiti and show them off online.

Will you dare to be square?




The Tilt Five™ holographic gaming system transforms video games into 3D vibrant holographic environments directly on your tabletop. Using the Tilt Five™ augmented reality (AR) glasses, Gameboard, and Wand controller, you can immerse yourself--and friends--in experiences like never before. Share and enjoy holograms together locally, remotely, or even stream them to your favorite social platforms using MixCast mixed-reality capture software.

英语*
*具有完全音频支持的语言
